parts.text: {"word":"quitar","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"取り除く、除去する、剥ぎ取る","english_definition":"to remove, take away, take off","examples":[{"sentence":"Quité el polvo de los muebles.","translation":"家具の埃を取り除いた。","english_translation":"I removed the dust from the furniture."},{"sentence":"Me quité los zapatos al entrar.","translation":"入る時に靴を脱いだ。","english_translation":"I took off my shoes when I entered."},{"sentence":"Le quitaron la licencia de conducir.","translation":"彼は運転免許を取り上げられた。","english_translation":"They took away his driver's license."}],"collocations":["quitar el polvo (埃を払う)","quitar la vida (命を奪う)","quitar importancia (重要性を下げる)","quitar el sueño (眠りを妨げる)"],"synonyms":["remover","eliminar","apartar","despejar","separar"],"antonyms":["poner","añadir","agregar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"奪う、盗む","english_definition":"to steal, take away by force","examples":[{"sentence":"Le quitaron la cartera en la calle.","translation":"彼は道で財布を奪われた。","english_translation":"They stole his wallet in the street."},{"sentence":"El ladrón le quitó el reloj.","translation":"泥棒は彼から時計を盗んだ。","english_translation":"The thief stole his watch."}],"collocations":["quitar algo a alguien (誰かから何かを奪う)"],"synonyms":["robar","arrebatar","despojar"],"antonyms":["devolver","regalar","dar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"取り除く、解消する、晴らす","english_definition":"to eliminate, dispel, clear away","examples":[{"sentence":"Esta medicina te quitará el dolor.","translation":"この薬はあなたの痛みを和らげるでしょう。","english_translation":"This medicine will take away your pain."},{"sentence":"Quitaron todas las dudas.","translation":"彼らはすべての疑問を解消した。","english_translation":"They cleared away all the doubts."}],"collocations":["quitar el dolor (痛みを和らげる)","quitar la sed (喉の渇きを癒す)","quitar el hambre (空腹を満たす)"],"synonyms":["aliviar","calmar","disipar","resolver"],"antonyms":["aumentar","agravar","empeorar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","pronominal","definition":"立ち去る、退く、離れる","english_definition":"to leave, go away, move away","examples":[{"sentence":"¡Quítate de mi camino!","translation":"私の邪魔をしないで！","english_translation":"Get out of my way!"},{"sentence":"Se quitó de la ventana.","translation":"彼は窓から離れた。","english_translation":"He moved away from the window."}],"collocations":["quitarse de en medio (邪魔にならないように退く)"],"synonyms":["marcharse","retirarse","alejarse","apartarse"],"antonyms":["acercarse","aproximarse","quedarse"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","pronominal","definition":"（習慣などを）やめる、捨てる","english_definition":"to give up, quit (a habit, etc.)","examples":[{"sentence":"Me he quitado de fumar.","translation":"タバコをやめました。","english_translation":"I have quit smoking."},{"sentence":"Deberías quitarte de beber tanto café.","translation":"あなたはそんなにコーヒーを飲むのをやめるべきだ。","english_translation":"You should quit drinking so much coffee."}],"collocations":["quitarse de vicios (悪癖をやめる)"],"synonyms":["abandonar","dejar","renunciar"],"antonyms":["empezar","comenzar","adoptar"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の *quietāre* 「静かにする、休ませる」から派生。これは *quietus* 「静かな」に由来する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/kiˈtaɾ/","syllables":"qui-tar"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["quito","quitas","quita","quitamos","quitáis","quitan"],"past_simple":"quité","past_participle":"quitado","present_participle":"quitando"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「quitar」は非常に一般的な動詞で、文脈によって様々な意味を持ちます。物理的なものを取り除くことから、抽象的なもの（痛み、疑いなど）を取り除くこと、さらには習慣をやめることまで、幅広い意味で使用されます。再帰動詞「quitarse」としても頻繁に使用され、意味が変化することがあります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Quité a mi amigo el libro.","correct":"Le quité el libro a mi amigo.","note":"間接目的語代名詞（le, les）を使用する必要があります。"},{"incorrect":"Quitar la ropa.","correct":"Quitarse la ropa.","note":"自分自身の服を脱ぐ場合は、再帰動詞「quitarse」を使用します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["quita (名詞: 取り除くこと、取り除く人)","quitamanchas (名詞: シミ抜き剤)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「quitar」は、何かを取り除く、奪う、またはやめるという意味で使われる一般的な動詞です。例えば、「Quitar el polvo（埃を払う）」や「Quitarse los zapatos（靴を脱ぐ）」のように使います。また、「Me quité de fumar（タバコをやめた）」のように、習慣をやめる意味でも使われます。文脈によって意味が異なるので注意が必要です。再帰動詞「quitarse」もよく使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Necesito quitar esta mancha de la camisa.","translation":"シャツのこのシミを取り除く必要があります。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"取り除く"},{"sentence":"El viento le quitó el sombrero.","translation":"風が彼の帽子を奪った。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"奪う"},{"sentence":"Quítate de ahí antes de que te caigas.","translation":"落ちる前にそこから離れて。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"離れる"},{"sentence":"Voy a quitarme de beber refrescos.","translation":"私は炭酸飲料を飲むのをやめるつもりです。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"やめる"},{"sentence":"Quitaron la nieve de la carretera.","translation":"彼らは道路から雪を取り除いた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"取り除く"}]}
